jobDescription: Senior BI/Data AnalystJob  code: 8546Job Category: Data AnalystCity: San FranciscoJob Description:Job Title: Senior Business Intelligence and Data AnalystLocation: CA-San FranciscoDuration: 6 months with hireJob Description/Responsibilities: ? Formulate and perform data mining, mathematical modeling, statistical/quantitative analyses, experiments (A/B testing), optimization and predictive analytics, data investigation, and reporting to support product, research, sales, market intelligences, and management teams  ? Effectively communicate quantitative findings, make and defend meaningful conclusions and recommendations, identify and interpret trends and relationships  ? Work with product and cross-functional teams to tie qualitative data with quantitative data to draw inferences about user behaviors, consumption pattern, and content performance across platforms and devices  ? Identify and synthesize secondary research to complement primary research  ? Design, improve, and automate processes related to tracking and reporting  ? Develop data programs to educate effective product development and optimizations Required Skills/Experience Skills/Experiences: ? Minimum Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Math, Statistics, Economics, Engineering, Computer Science, Physics, or equivalent quantitative field  ? 2-7 years relevant working experience (in a similar role) with strong technical analytical ability and data mining skills  ? Excellent statistical intuition, application, and knowledge of various analytical approaches  ? Extensive experience querying large, complex, and raw data sets in Teradata/Hive/Hadoop databases.  ? Proficient in advanced SQL and with statistical software (preferably R)  ? Proficient with video/web analytics and tools (Omniture, Tableau)  ? Proficient with Excel and PowerPoint  ? Must be detail-oriented and focused on data accuracy  ? Must have excellent verbal and written communication skills; ability to effectively communicate and present data and information  ? Proven ability to learn quickly, work independently, and adapt to change in a fast-paced environment  ? Passion for news, video, social networking, advertising, and digital entertainment industry  ? Build strong working relationships with coworkers, customers, and company management  ? Must successfully pass a background check Pluses: ? Experience with programming languages (PHP, C, Perl, Python, etc) a strong plus  ? Experience with internal and external APIs (Google, Facebook, Twitter, etc)  Let me know if you are interested in this job role and/or if you can assist us by referring someone who is since we offer the lucrative referral bonuses.
